attributes.action: make it a public order offence to play music from mobile phones and other portable devices on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give the police power to issue spot fines to those who play music at a volume that can be heard by other travellers.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make it a public order offence to play music from mobile phones and other portable devices on public transport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11176.asp
